1.caption_en: A slide titled "The Platform Value Stack" illustrates four layered capabilities—Infrastructure, Intelligence, Engagement, and Ecosystem—stacked from physical "Things" up to "Sustainability." Each layer describes the value it provides (infrastructure enabling layers above; intelligence connecting data; engagement linking supply and demand; ecosystem generating positive societal and environmental impact) to deliver exceptional user experiences.
